name.baseName: 熟料生产|熟料|垃圾衍生燃料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the Beijing Regulations on Domestic Waste Management (Beijing municipal commission of housing and urban-rural development, 2021), domestic waste was classified as food waste (FW), residual waste (RW), recyclable and hazardous waste. Converting domestic waste into refuse-derived fuel (RDF) as an alternative fuel for clinker production. The RW was divided into two parts with a sifter. The oversize mainly contained light combustibles, such as paper, plastic, and wood. They were crushed and compressed with 5% lime to make the refuse-derived fuel (RDF CDW), which was used as an alternative fuel in the cement kiln to replace part of the coal. The undersize mainly consisted of incombustible, such as lime soil, bricks, ceramics, glass, and metals, which were fed into the raw meal mill after being crushed. The FW was pre-homogenized with crushed limestone and then entered into the batching system. It has also been used as the alternative raw material. There was no drying for FW because its moisture was just utilized by limestone pre-homogenization. Clinker production in scenario 4 used limestone, sandstone, shale, iron powder, the undersize of RW and FW as raw materials, and used coal and RDFCDW as fuels. Coal ash and RDF CDW ash were also used as raw ma terials. The clinker quality parameters, thermal substitution rate (TSR), and proportion of alternative raw materials in the raw meal were considered as constraint conditions to adjust the material usage. The power consumption in each stage was calculated based on the electricity consumption index for cement production.

根据北京市住房和城乡建设委员会2021年发布的《北京市生活垃圾管理条例》，生活垃圾被分为食品垃圾（Food waste，FW）、其他垃圾（Residual waste，RW）、可回收物和危险废物。将生活垃圾转化为垃圾衍生燃料（Refuse-derived fuel，RDF）作为生产熟料的替代燃料。 RW被筛分为两部分。超过尺寸的部分主要包含易燃材料，如纸张、塑料和木材。将它们与5%的石灰粉碎和压缩成为垃圾衍生燃料（RDF CDW），用作水泥窑炉中的替代燃料以取代部分煤。欠尺寸的部分主要由不可燃材料组成，如石灰土、砖、陶瓷、玻璃和金属，经过破碎后进入生料磨。FW与碎石灰预混，然后进入配料系统。它也被用作替代原料。FW不需要干燥，因为它的水分被石灰石预混利用。在情景中，熟料生产使用了石灰石、砂岩、页岩、铁粉、RW欠尺寸和FW作为原材料，以及煤和RDF CDW作为燃料。煤灰和RDF CDW灰也被用作原材料。考虑到熟料质量参数、热替代率（Thermal substitution rate，TSR）和原料中替代品的比例，调整了物料用量。每个阶段的电力消耗根据水泥生产的电耗指标进行计算。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Shandong Shenfeng Cement Group Co., Ltd
山东申丰水泥集团有限公司

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Two functional units were defined as 1 t of clinker, and the amount of food waste (FW) and residual waste (RW) applied in producing 1 t of clinker. The system boundary includes coal powder preparation, raw meal preparation and clinker calcination.
定义了两个功能单元，分别为1吨熟料和生产1吨熟料所需的食物垃圾和残余废物数量。 系统边界包括煤粉制备、生料制备和熟料煅烧。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataCutOffAndCompletenessPrinciples: The wastewater of cement enterprises came from the circulating cooling water and spray water, the main pollutantscontained only a small amount of water scale, and almost no wastewater was discharged from the plants. Therefore, wastewater in the clinker production process was not considered.
水泥企业的废水来自循环冷却水和喷淋水，主要污染物只含少量水垢，几乎没有废水从工厂排放。因此，未考虑熟料生产过程中的废水。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The clinker was produced by calcining limestone, sandstone, shale, and iron powder in a cement kiln with the heat provided by coal. Coal ash, the combustionproduct of coal, was also used as a raw material. The chemical composition and moisture content of the materials are listed. Bituminouscoal with a calorificvalue of 24,000 kJ/kg and ash content of 12.5% was selected. The heat consumption of clinker generationwas 3000 kJ/kg. First, the ratio of raw material consumption was assumed, and then the coal consumption, coal ash incorporation rate, raw meal composition, raw meal composition after ignition, clinker composition, and clinker quality parameters, including the lime saturation factor (KH), silica modulus (SM), and alumina modulus (IM), were calculated based on Equations. The clinker quality parameters were as follows: KH = 0.89 ± 0.02, SM = 2.5 ± 0.1, IM = 1.5 ± 0.1. The amount of wet material was calculated using Equation. The power consumption at each stage was calculated according to the electricity consumption index for cement production.
首先假定原材料消耗比例，然后根据公式计算煤的消耗量、煤灰掺入率、生料配比、点火后生料配比、熟料配比以及熟料质量参数，包括石灰饱和度系数（KH）、硅酸盐模数（SM）和铝酸盐模数（IM）。熟料质量参数为KH=0.89±0.02，SM=2.5±0.1，IM=1.5±0.1。用公式计算了湿物料的数量。各阶段的电力消耗按水泥生产的电力消耗指数计算。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Xuemin Liang, Wenling Dang, Guangling Yang, & Yueling Zhang. (2023). Environmental feasibility evaluation of cement co-production using classified domestic waste as alternative raw material and fuel: A life cycle perspective. Journal of Environmental Management 326, 116726.

exchange.generalComment: Undersize of residual waste (RW). Regulations stipulate that wood, lime soil, bricks, and ceramics should be sorted as RW.
剩余废物。法规规定，木材、石灰土、砖块和陶瓷应作为RW进行分类处理。

Electricity. The power consumption at each stage was calculated according to the electricity consumption index for cement production (Wang, 2013). The background processes data from GaBi databases: electricity production, “CN: Electricity grid mix PE”.
电力。各阶段的耗电量是根据水泥生产的电力消耗指标进行计算的(Wang, 2013)。背景过程数据来自GaBi数据库：electricity production, “CN: Electricity grid mix PE”。

RDFCDW: refuse-derived fuel (RDF) by using classified domestic waste (CDW). Alternative fuel for clinker production. Calculation of the calorific value of RDFCDW The domestic waste considered in this study originated from urban and rural areas. Ac cording to the proportion of urban and rural populations (61.51% and 38.49%, respectively) (National Bureau of Statistics, 2020b) and waste components (Li et al., 2018), the components of urban-rural integrated waste can be obtained. After being classified according to the Regulations, the components of the RW and FW can be obtained. The domesticwaste and RDFCDW components are presented. The calorific value of the RDF CDW was calculated using Equations. The RDFCDW substitution rate was chosen to be 30% for the commoninternational TSR (Bourtsalas et al., 2018). The RDFCDW consumption was calculated using Equation. LHV=HHV×(1-MC)-MC×44/18×10^3, MC=∑_j▒f_j c_j, HHV=∑_j▒〖Q_j c_j 〗. Where LHV is the lower heat value of RDFCDW (kJ/kg), 44 is the latent heat of water evaporation (kJ/mol), 18 is the molecular weight of water, MC is the moisture of the RDFCDW (%), fj is the moisture of the jth component in the RDFCDW (43.2% for paper, 43.5% for plastic, 44.2% for wood, and 0% for lime), HHV is the higher heat value of RDFCDW (kJ/kg), Qj is the heat value of the jth component in the RDFCDW (15656 kJ/kg for paper, 39003 kJ/kg for plastic, 22128 kJ/kg for wood, and 0 kJ/kg for lime), and cj is the proportion of the jth component in the RDFCDW (%). m_(RDF_CDW )=(30%×"q" )/LHV. Where is the consumption of RDFCDW in the cement kiln (kg), 30% refers to the TSR, and q is the heat consumption of clinker generation (kJ/kg).

RDFCDW：利用分类后的城市生活垃圾（CDW）制备的垃圾衍生燃料（RDF）。用于熟料生产的替代燃料。 计算RDFCDW的热值：本研究考虑的生活垃圾来自城市和农村地区。根据城乡人口比例（分别为61.51%和38.49%）（国家统计局，2020b）和垃圾组成（Li等，2018），可以得到城乡一体化垃圾的组成。经过法规要求的分类后，可以得到可燃和不可燃垃圾的组成。给出了生活垃圾和RDFCDW的组成。使用公式计算了RDFCDW的热值。对于普通国际TSR（Bourtsalas等，2018），选择了RDFCDW的替代率为30%。 使用公式计算了RDFCDW的消耗量。 LHV=HHV×(1-MC)-MC×44/18×10^3，MC=∑_j▒f_j c_j，HHV=∑_j▒〖Q_j c_j 〗。其中LHV是RDFCDW的低位发热值（kJ/kg），44是水蒸气蒸发的潜热（kJ/mol），18是水的分子量，MC是RDFCDW的水分含量（%），fj是RDFCDW中第j个组分的水分含量（纸张为43.2%，塑料为43.5%，木材为44.2%，石灰为0%），HHV是RDFCDW的高位发热值（kJ/kg），Qj是RDFCDW中第j个组分的热值（纸张为15656 kJ/kg，塑料为39003 kJ/kg，木材为22128 kJ/kg，石灰为0 kJ/kg），cj是RDFCDW中第j个组分的比例（%）。 m_(RDF_CDW )=(30%×"q" )/LHV，其中m_(RDF_CDW )是水泥窑中RDFCDW的消耗量（kg），30%是TSR，q是熟料生成的热耗量（kJ/kg）。

CO2. E_(CO_2 )=E_"coal" +E_(CaCO_3 ), E_coal=NCV×FC×CC×OF×44/10, E_(C"a" CO_3 )=(FR_1-FR_10)×44/56+(FR_2-FR_20)×44/40. Where E_(CO_2 ) represents CO2 emissions from the cement kiln (t), E_"coal" represents CO2 emissions from coal combustion (t), E_(CaCO_3 ) represents CO2 emissions from the carbonate decomposition of raw materials (t), NCV is the lower heat value of coal (19.570 GJ/t), FC is the consumption of coal (t), CC is the carbon content per unit heat value of coal (0.0261 t C/GJ), OF is the carbon oxidation rate of coal (98%), FR1 is the content of CaO in clinker (%), FR10 is the content of CaO in clinker that is not derived from carbonate decomposition (%), FR2 is the content of MgO in clinker (%), FR20 is the content of MgO in clinker that is not derived from carbonate decomposition (%), and 44/56 and 44/40 are the molecular weight conversion between CO2 and CaO, MgO respectively. FR_10=(FS_10)/((1-L)×F_"c" ), FR_20=(FS_20)/((1-L)×F_"c" ). Where Fc is the conversion factor of coal ash content in clinker (1.04), FS10 is the content of CaO in raw meal that is not in the form of carbonate (%), and FS20 is the content of MgO in the raw meal that is not in the form of carbonate (%). FS_10=(∑_"n" ▒〖(m_n×r_10n)〗)/m, FS_20=(∑_"n" ▒〖(m_n×r_20n)〗)/m. Where mn is the mass of the nth raw material except limestone (kg), r10n is the content of CaO in the nth raw material except limestone (%), r20n is the content of MgO in the nth raw material except limestone (%), and m is clinker consumption (kg).

CO2。E_(CO_2 )=E_"coal" +E_(CaCO_3 ), E_coal=NCV×FC×CC×OF×44/10, E_(C"a" CO_3 )=(FR_1-FR_10)×44/56+(FR_2-FR_20)×44/40. 其中，E_(CO_2 )表示水泥窑炉的CO2排放量（t），E_"coal"表示煤燃烧的CO2排放量（t），E_(CaCO_3 )表示原材料的碳酸盐分解引起的CO2排放量（t）， NCV是煤炭的低位热值（19.570 GJ/t），FC是煤炭的消耗量（t），CC是煤炭单位热值的碳含量（0.0261 t C/GJ），OF是煤炭的碳氧化率（98%），FR1是熟料中CaO的含量（%），FR10是熟料中非碳酸盐分解产生的CaO的含量（%），FR2是熟料中MgO的含量（%），FR20是熟料中非碳酸盐分解产生的MgO的含量（%），44/56和44/40分别是CO2和CaO、MgO之间的分子量转换因子。FR_10=(FS_10)/((1-L)×F_"c" ), FR_20=(FS_20)/((1-L)×F_"c" ). 其中，Fc是熟料中非碳酸盐形式的煤灰含量的转换因子（1.04），FS10是生料中非碳酸盐形式的CaO含量（%），FS20是生料中非碳酸盐形式的MgO含量（%）。FS_10=(∑_"n" ▒〖(m_n×r_10n)〗)/m, FS_20=(∑_"n" ▒〖(m_n×r_20n)〗)/m.其中，mn是第n个除石灰石外的原材料的质量（kg），r10n是第n个除石灰石外的原材料中的CaO含量（%），r20n是第n个除石灰石外的原材料中的MgO含量（%），m是熟料消耗量（kg）。

SOx. P_(SO_2 )=64/80×"m"×SO_3 (1-X)×〖10〗^3, where P_(SO_2 ) is the SO2 emission from the cement kiln (kg), 64/80 is the molecular weight ratio of SO2 to SO3, m is clinker consumption (t), SO3 is the SO3 content in the raw meal (%), and X is the SO3 absorption rate of the raw meal (88%).
SOx。P_(SO_2 )=64/80×"m"×SO_3 (1-X)×〖10〗^3, 其中 P_(SO_2 ) 表示水泥窑中的SO2排放量（千克），64/80是SO2与SO3的分子量比，m是熟料消耗量（吨），SO3是生料中的SO3含量（%），X是生料中的SO3吸收率（88%）。

NOx. P_(NO_x )=(R_Y×16+R_L×7)×m_coal×〖10〗^(-3), Where P_(NO_x ) is the NOx emission from the cement kiln (kg), R_L and R_Y are the ratios of fuel used in the rotary kiln and precalciner (0.6 and 0.4, respectively), and m_coal is the coal consumption of clinker generation (kg).
NOx。P_(NO_x )=(R_Y×16+R_L×7)×m_coal×〖10〗^(-3)，其中 P_(NO_x ) 表示水泥窑中的NOx排放量（千克），R_L和R_Y分别是旋转窑和预煅器中使用的燃料比例（分别为0.6和0.4），m_coal是熟料生产中的煤炭消耗量（千克）。
